title: App won't launch even though I have Java 8

comments.body: A common problem with Macs is that you need install the Java *JDK*, not just the runtime edition (JRE).
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body: Thanks for your quick response. I'm pretty sure I did install the JDK. In any case, I just reinstalled it ("Java SE Development Kit 8u25") and am still getting the same message every time I try to open Magarena. Could it be an issue with the recent Yosemite update? Is Magarena compatible with SDK 8 or just 7?
comments.author: [Eli.Mitc...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/103289212003205131740/)

comments.body: Thanks for the report. I double checked the launcher, it is only checking for SE 7 but not SE 8. Will fix this for Oct release coming up this weekend.
